ailitobjectives.label: Understand the basic concept of AI, its main components, and everyday examples.
Discuss ethical implications of AI, including issues of privacy, bias, and decision-making.
Understand the concept of bias in AI and its societal implications.
Understand the collaboration between human creativity and AI algorithms.
Recognize the importance of digital privacy and the role of AI in data collection.
Understand the basics of safe online behavior in AI-integrated platforms.
Evaluate the reliability of AI-driven content (e.g., deepfakes, automated articles, hallucinations).
